title: Quick Start Guide to Oracle Fusion Development
description:

Get Started with Oracle Fusion Development
Written by a Group Product Manager at Oracle, this Oracle guide gets you up and running quickly with your first Oracle Fusion applications. Quick Start Guide to Oracle Fusion Development pres only the essential information you need to build applications in a matter of hours.
